name: The Shadow Over My Name
description:
“A shadow over my name” is a Lovecraftian story for late nights, a bit satirical, and takes about half an hour to complete, and is on auto-pilot most of the time.

Read by Phillip Nathaniel Freeman.

It explores the lives of a freelance artist and an indie game developer, and what they are willing to do in order to create a successful product and become famous, struggling against competition and ruthless industry practice.

Please consider supporting my next project
